p: The case report in this article refers to an ALS-like syndrome after an infection by the Chikungunya virus (CHIKV). CHIKV is an arbovirus belonging to the family Togaviridae, genus Alphavirus, transmitted by mosquitoes of the genus Aedes, particularly Aedes aegypti and Aedes albopictus, two invasive and cosmopolitan species. According to the Brazilian Ministry of Health, symptomatic cases can manifest in two forms: typical and atypical [ 12].
